

Problem description
Todo En Uno comprises of various interesting rounds which test the logical abilities and problem solving skills of the participants, in unique ways. All in all, it is a great event to tickle your grey cells. The Todo team now wants to check your mathematical skills. You are given N integers, output the maximum value of GCD for all the pairs possible.

Input
There is a single positive integer T on the first line of input. It stands for the number of cases to follow.  Each case consists of a number N, the number of time each tool was used.

Output
Output consists of T lines, each line has an integer representing the maximum value of GCD.

Constraints
1<=T<=5
2<=N<=100000
1<=A[i]s<=1000000


Example
Input:
1
5
1 2 3 4 5

Output:
2
